izo was a flatulent blue ox beast of burden that belonged to an eccentric merchant named Yani Pavani circa 1372 DR.
Kizos entire career consisted of dragging the overeager merchants wagon across the Sword Coast. The beast accompanied its owner to the hamlet of Liams Hold in the , where Yani Pavani forced her interior decoration skills on the Hero of Daggerfordâ€“the new proud owner of the Stronghold keep. When the duos work was over, Yani decided to stay in the quaint town for a while, and Kizo was happy to chew on the hamlets abundant over-ripe greenery.
